about_the_game:
Somniora is a horror-puzzle game. Get ready to delve into the adventure of our character, who is trapped amidst strange dreams, while searching for answers to the questions lurking in their subconscious.

Amara

Like everyone else, you are someone trying to earn a living through your talent. While your debts and problems never seem to end, you also have to deal with your past. Psychological support aside, you cannot even sleep without medication. Why are you so afraid?

The big day

When that day comes, you won’t even know where you are because you’re on the other side, and if the ones controlling that place don’t want you to wake up, you won’t. Of course, defeating them might change things. A little blood may be spilled...

Mechanics

Flashlight: As expected, you’ll have to use this to navigate through the darkness because the dream you’re in will be very dark.

The Radio: A mysterious figure will do something unprecedented by communicating with you in this dream, claiming to help you. It’s up to you to decide if they’re telling the truth.

The Mask: Another mysterious ability... This mask also guides you and holds great power within. The only problem is that it doesn’t treat Amara well. But here’s a little secret: this mask holds far more than it appears...

Puzzle

Throughout the game you will have to solve various puzzles. These puzzles are the only key Amara has to get out of this dream. I hope you have a good memory, because many times in the puzzles you will have to keep the information in your mind. =)

Traumas

Clown: One of Amara’s biggest traumas is her alcoholic stepfather, who poisoned her childhood. He is the main figure in this dream... But he was dead... He was no longer here...

Angel of Goodness: One of the most intriguing characters you will encounter during Amara's journey is the Angel of Goodness. This character can guide you from time to time. The hints they provide sometimes point to dangers, other times to salvation. You must be cautious when encountering the Angel of Goodness, as escaping this dream without their guidance doesn’t seem very likely.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood, moderate violence and accidental death
